tests.name: casting - time to string
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, TIME TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');

tests.name: time in complex types
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, S STRUCT<TIME TIME>, A ARRAY<TIME>, M MAP<STRING, TIME>) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, S -> TIME AS S, A[1] AS A, M['TIME'] AS M FROM TEST;
